thread.title: UST Global Wins Award for Best Project of the Year at PMI India Awards by Project Management Institute (PMI)
thread.title_full: UST Global Wins Award for Best Project of the Year at PMI India Awards by Project Management Institute (PMI)

title: UST Global Wins Award for Best Project of the Year at PMI India Awards by Project Management Institute (PMI)
text:
Wednesday, September 30, 2015 1:05PM IST (7:35AM GMT) UST Global Wins Award for Best Project of the Year at PMI India Awards by Project Management Institute (PMI) The project focused on providing revolutionary user experience & performance thereby providing a unique competitive advantage Bangalore, Karnataka, India 
UST Global, a leading digital technology services company that provides powerful solutions for Global 1000 companies, has been recognized for the project ‘Shopping Portal for Health Insurance plans for a US Fortune 50 Healthcare Giant’. This solution won the award for Best Project of the Year in the small enterprises category at the PMI India Awards organized by Project Management Institute (PMI). The Shopping Portal has made the client a pioneer in its market and multiple patents have been filed. The revolutionary user experience provides the right choices to the consumer and positively impacts the revenue. Speaking on the occasion, Chief Operating Officer of UST Global, Arun Narayanan UST Global, said , “It is an honor for UST Global to be recognized by PMI for our work in project management. This project is another successful example of our “Design for happiness” approach. In the rapidly changing healthcare segment, this project reaffirms our commitment to transforming 3 billion lives through digital & technology.” The PMI India Awards Program by the Project Management Institute (PMI) is one of the highest recognitions for the project management community in the country. Since 2009 PMI, one of the world's largest not-for-profit membership associations for the project management profession has been administering these awards in India to honor excellence in the project management profession. 
About UST Global 

UST Global is a leading digital technology services company that provides powerful solutions for Global 1000 companies. UST Global’s mission is to lead companies through critical digital transformations to drive higher business value. UST Global specializes in six next generation digital services – design, cyber security, mobile, social, analytics and cloud. Powered by the mantra ‘fewer clients, more attention’, UST Global strives for excellence in providing their clients high quality services and a commitment to long-term success. Headquartered in Aliso Viejo, California, UST Global has over 15,000 associates; operating in 25 countries across four continents. Please visit www.ust-global.com for more information. For News Release background on UST Global click here Manoj M Mani, UST Global, +91-9632000553, Manoj.Mattamana@ust-global.com Elita Sequeira, Gutenberg Communications, +91-9740648708, elita@gutenbergpr.com
